name: countermove
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an action by one person that is a reaction to an action by someone else: Campaign strategists meet to plan their moves and counter-moves. Businesses see the early release of sales plans as giving competitors an opportunity to make a countermove.
More examplesFewer examplesTo deal with unexpected events, the management must be ready to devise clever counter-moves.The key is to have an immediate countermove that shakes off the defender. She could respond to every move with a countermove.
